scripts.inject:sea: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$node=(Get-Command node).Source; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force build | Out-Null; Copy-Item $node ./build/node_base.exe -Force; npx postject ./build/node_base.exe NODE_SEA_BLOB ./main.sea --overwrite --sentinel-fuse NODE_SEA_FUSE_fce680ab2cc467b6e072b8b5df1996b2; if (Test-Path ./build/capture-web.exe) { Remove-Item ./build/capture-web.exe -Force }; Move-Item ./build/node_base.exe ./build/capture-web.exe -Force"
scripts.dist: npm run build:sea && npm run inject:sea
